mapper.select: select s.so_id,s.so_theme,s.update_date,s.status,s.con_name,s.con_phone,s.architecture,s.cus_source,s.priority, s.stage,s.dis_time,s.provider,s.cus_demand,s.signing_time,s.possibility,s.amount,s.star_target,s.del_status from salesopport s where s.del_status=1 order by s.so_id desc

select s.so_id,s.so_theme,s.update_date,s.status,s.con_name,s.con_phone,s.architecture,s.cus_source,s.priority, s.stage,s.dis_time,s.provider,s.cus_demand,s.signing_time,s.possibility,s.amount,s.star_target,s.del_status, sl.sl_id, sl.sl_note, sl.record_time, sl.stage_name, sl.user_name, c.cus_id,c.cus_name,u.u_id,u.u_name from salesopport s left join stagelog sl on s.so_id = sl.so_id left join user u on s.u_id = u.u_id left join customer c on s.cus_id = c.cus_id where s.del_status=1 and s.so_id=#{soid} order by s.so_id desc

select s.so_id,s.so_theme,s.update_date,s.status,s.con_name,s.con_phone,s.architecture,s.cus_source,s.priority, s.stage,s.dis_time,s.provider,s.cus_demand,s.signing_time,s.possibility,s.amount,s.star_target,s.del_status, c.cus_id,c.cus_name,u.u_id,u.u_name from salesopport s left join user u on s.u_id = u.u_id left join customer c on s.cus_id = c.cus_id where s.del_status=1 and s.so_id=#{soid} order by s.so_id desc
select s.so_id,s.so_theme from salesopport s left join customer c2 on s.cus_id = c2.cus_id where s.del_status=1 and c2.cus_id=#{cusid}
